thread.title: Entergy Louisiana to suspend utility disconnections ahead of freeze | wwltv.com
thread.title_full: Entergy Louisiana to suspend utility disconnections ahead of freeze | wwltv.com

author: Nigell Moses / WWL Louisiana
title: Entergy Louisiana to suspend utility disconnections ahead of freeze | wwltv.com
text: NEW ORLEANS — Entergy Louisiana plans to [ suspend utility disconnections](https://www.nola.com/news/weather/entergy-louisiana-to-suspend-disconnections-during-freeze/article_0150387c-b185-11ee-a75f-67b402ed7052.html#tncms-source=featured-3) ahead of next week's hard freeze, the company announced Friday. Across the state, temperatures are expected to drop below freezing, according to Nola.com. The company said customers with unpaid or overdue bills will not see the regular shut-offs to their electricity starting [Monday, Jan. 15 until Friday, Jan. 19](https://www.nola.com/news/weather/entergy-louisiana-to-suspend-disconnections-during-freeze/article_0150387c-b185-11ee-a75f-67b402ed7052.html#tncms-source=featured-3), out of "an abundance of caution for customer safety," our partners at Nola.com reported. Entergy Louisiana will [ consider disconnections on a daily basis](https://www.nola.com/news/weather/entergy-louisiana-to-suspend-disconnections-during-freeze/article_0150387c-b185-11ee-a75f-67b402ed7052.html#tncms-source=featured-3), depending on the weather following the anticipated freeze. However, it is not clear if Entergy New Orleans plans to take the same safety measures. ► Get breaking news from your neighborhood delivered directly to you by downloading the new FREE WWL-TV News app now in the [IOS App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/new-orleans-news-from-wwl/id1453203460) or [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.doapps.android.mln.MLN_d6bcd10196773d6203b7e9b10e53fea3&hl=en_US).
